vulnerabilities.description: XSS vulnerability in react-draft-wysiwyg related to embedded buttons in iframes.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Malicious iframe content can execute arbitrary JavaScript through embedded buttons.

vulnerabilities.description: React DOM in versions prior to 16.14.0 allows XSS via crafted iframe srcdoc attributes.
vulnerabilities.exploit: An attacker can craft iframe srcdoc attributes that bypass React's XSS protections.

vulnerabilities.description: XSS vulnerability in react-tooltip through raw HTML in tooltips, affecting Bruno IDE.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Malicious HTML in tooltips can execute arbitrary JavaScript.

vulnerabilities.description: Multiple XSS vulnerabilities in early React versions (0.0.1 to 0.13.x).
vulnerabilities.exploit: Various XSS attack vectors in early React implementations.

vulnerabilities.description: Vue.js is vulnerable to XSS attacks when using v-bind with the style attribute.
vulnerabilities.exploit: An attacker can inject malicious CSS expressions that execute JavaScript.

vulnerabilities.description: Vue.js is vulnerable to XSS when using v-html with untrusted content.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Malicious HTML can be injected through v-html directive.

vulnerabilities.description: Command injection vulnerability in lodash.template via HeroDevs/Nuxt 2/Vue 2 dependency.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Potential command injection through template processing.

vulnerabilities.description: AngularJS ng-srcset attribute contains a regex-based ReDoS vulnerability causing critical performance slowdown.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Specially crafted input to ng-srcset can cause denial of service through regex processing.

vulnerabilities.description: AngularJS srcset attribute sanitization vulnerability allowing content modification.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Improper sanitization in srcset attribute can lead to content modification similar to XSS.

vulnerabilities.description: Another sanitization vulnerability in AngularJS reported by HeroDevs.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Sanitization bypass leading to potential content modification.

vulnerabilities.description: ReDoS vulnerability in AngularJS input[type=url] function.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Regular expression denial of service in URL input validation.

vulnerabilities.description: Angular is vulnerable to XSS attacks via specific template expressions.
vulnerabilities.exploit: An attacker can craft template expressions that bypass Angular's sanitization.

vulnerabilities.description: ReDoS vulnerability in AngularJS angular.copy() function.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Regular expression denial of service in copy function.

vulnerabilities.description: IE-specific XSS vulnerability in <textarea> interpolation in AngularJS.
vulnerabilities.exploit: An attacker can exploit textarea interpolation to execute XSS in Internet Explorer.

vulnerabilities.description: ReDoS vulnerability in AngularJS using high-value space parameters.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Regular expression denial of service through specially crafted space parameters.

vulnerabilities.description: XSS vulnerability in AngularJS versions before 1.8.0.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Cross-site scripting vulnerability allowing code execution.

vulnerabilities.description: XSS vulnerability in Angular 2-11 comment processing.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Cross-site scripting through malicious comment content.

vulnerabilities.description: Remote Code Execution in angular-expressions module.
vulnerabilities.exploit: RCE through compile(userInput) allowing arbitrary code execution.

vulnerabilities.description: Authentication bypass vulnerability in Next.js through x-middleware-subrequest-id header.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Attackers can bypass authentication using manipulated headers.

vulnerabilities.description: SSRF and credential leakage risk in Next.js middleware.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Server-side request forgery and credential exposure through x-middleware-subrequest-id.

vulnerabilities.description: Race condition causing pageProps data to be served as HTML in Next.js.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Race condition vulnerability affecting data rendering.

vulnerabilities.description: Source code leakage in Next.js development server.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Leakage of source code in development environment.

vulnerabilities.description: Next.js before 13.5.4 is vulnerable to path traversal attacks.
vulnerabilities.exploit: An attacker can access files outside the intended directory.

vulnerabilities.description: Next.js before 13.4.13 is vulnerable to XSS via specific HTML attributes.
vulnerabilities.exploit: An attacker can inject malicious scripts via specific HTML attributes.

vulnerabilities.description: Cache poisoning DoS vulnerability in React Router versions 7.2.0-7.5.1.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Attackers can cause denial of service through cache poisoning attacks.

vulnerabilities.description: Additional cache poisoning vulnerability in React Router versions 7.0-7.5.1.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Cache poisoning vulnerability allowing DoS attacks.

vulnerabilities.description: URL spoofing vulnerability in React Router using Host/X-Forwarded-Host headers.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Attackers can spoof URLs using manipulated HTTP headers.

vulnerabilities.description: URL spoofing vulnerability in Remix using Host/X-Forwarded-Host headers.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Attackers can spoof URLs using manipulated HTTP headers.

vulnerabilities.description: Nuxt.js before 3.8.0 is vulnerable to XSS via specific HTML attributes.
vulnerabilities.exploit: An attacker can inject malicious scripts via specific HTML attributes.

vulnerabilities.description: Nuxt.js before 2.15.8 is vulnerable to path traversal attacks.
vulnerabilities.exploit: An attacker can access files outside the intended directory.

vulnerabilities.description: Stored XSS vulnerability in jQuery News Ticker WordPress plugin through shortcode.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Attackers can inject XSS payloads through WordPress shortcodes.

vulnerabilities.description: SQL injection vulnerability in jQuery Accordion Slideshow plugin.
vulnerabilities.exploit: SQL injection through plugin parameters.

vulnerabilities.description: jQuery before 3.5.0 is vulnerable to XSS via specific HTML strings.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Specially crafted HTML can execute scripts when processed by jQuery.

vulnerabilities.description: jQuery before 3.4.0 is vulnerable to prototype pollution.
vulnerabilities.exploit: An attacker can modify JavaScript object prototypes via jQuery.extend.

vulnerabilities.description: Prototype pollution in @75lb/deep-merge module, a lodash-related dependency.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Critical prototype pollution allowing arbitrary code execution.

vulnerabilities.description: Command injection vulnerability in lodash.template via HeroDevs/Nuxt 2/Vue 2 dependency.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Potential command injection through template processing.

vulnerabilities.description: Prototype pollution in lodash.zipObjectDeep function.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Attackers can pollute JavaScript prototypes leading to various security issues.

vulnerabilities.description: URL processing flaw in Axios: even with baseURL set, absolute URLs bypass it causing SSRF and credential leakage.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Attackers can cause SSRF and credential leakage through URL manipulation.

vulnerabilities.description: Express.js before 4.17.3 is vulnerable to request smuggling.
vulnerabilities.exploit: An attacker can craft HTTP requests that bypass security controls.

vulnerabilities.description: Express.js before 4.17.3 is vulnerable to denial of service via large transfer-encoding headers.
vulnerabilities.exploit: An attacker can cause DoS by sending large transfer-encoding headers.

vulnerabilities.description: Bootstrap before 5.3.1 is vulnerable to XSS via tooltip and popover components.
vulnerabilities.exploit: An attacker can inject malicious scripts via tooltip and popover content.

vulnerabilities.description: Bootstrap before 4.3.1 is vulnerable to XSS via data-template attribute.
vulnerabilities.exploit: An attacker can inject malicious scripts via data-template attribute.

vulnerabilities.description: Tailwind CSS before 2.2.0 is vulnerable to prototype pollution.
vulnerabilities.exploit: An attacker can modify JavaScript object prototypes via crafted CSS classes.

vulnerabilities.description: Prototype pollution vulnerability in Fast-loops package.
vulnerabilities.exploit: Prototype pollution allowing various security issues.
